description: Enterprise techniques used by Mivast, ATT&CK software S0080 v1.0
name: Mivast (S0080)

techniques.comment: Mivast has the capability to open a remote shell and run basic commands.[2]
Mivast communicates over port 80 for C2.[2]
Mivast has the capability to gather NTLM password information.[2]
Mivast creates the following Registry entry: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\Micromedia.[2]
Mivast has the capability to download and execute .exe files.[2]
